description:
A man named Damon visits Melmo`s house and tells her that he will let her see her mother if she gave him candies. True to his words, Melmo`s mother is back. But Totoo who is now a frog and Touch, who is only a little baby, instinctively understands that the mother is a fake. In fact, the mother who comes back home is a doll that has been implanted with a snake`s soul and is being manipulated by Damon. Melmo runs away from the fake mother, but the mother with a snake`s soul begins to truly love Melmo and her little brothers. 
Source: tezukaosamu.net
